item.title: Microsoft - Full Keynote | Satya Nadella at Microsoft Build 2023
item.description: It’s like reading my mind. It’s magic. We’re innovating at a scale like never before. It takes what you prompt it with and just runs with it. Everything is linked. Everything is easy to use. We’re accelerating how fast we can deliver solutions to our fans, to our business. It takes the hands-on time that the provider has to spend with the computer and puts that time back with the patient.

item.title: Microsoft - The Future of Work With AI - Microsoft March 2023 Event
item.description: SATYA NADELLA: Welcome, and thank you for joining us. We are here today to talk about something that’s very fundamental to the human experience, the way we work. Most specifically, the way we work with computers. In fact, we’ve been on this continuous journey towards human-computer symbiosis for several decades. Starting with Vannevar Bush’s vision that he outlined in his seminal 1945 essay, As We May Think. Bush envisioned of futuristic device
